content.meaning: This sensor directly measures the duration (T) capital is guaranteed to remain fixed. A 48-month lead time means the capital flow associated with that unit is temporally locked, making the revenue stream highly predictable and insulating the sector from short-term macro economic contraction risk. It proves policy execution is overriding macro uncertainty.

evidence.source: [긴급진단] 전력 인프라, 지금이 마지막 탑승 기회인가? (feat. 변압기 슈퍼사이클)
